    public static class RootedTree.ChildOverlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Overlay, java.io.Serializable
    An overlay that causes nodes to gossip only to their children

        public Distribution<Address> getView(RuntimeState rts)
        Description copied from interface: Overlay
        This method is used by the MiCA runtime, but users should use the no-parameter variant. Returns the exported view, which may be dependent on protocol runtime state.
